mapper.select: select * from tb_like where target_id=#{userId} and user_id=#{loginUserId}
select count(*) from tb_like where user_id=#{id} and type=1

select l.id, type, target_id, user_id, title_kor, change_name from tb_like l join tb_film f on(l.target_id = f.id) left join (select film_id, change_name from tb_detail_film df join tb_film_image fi on(df.id = fi.dfilm_id))b on(b.film_id = f.id) where type=1 and user_id=#{id}
select count(*) from tb_like where user_id=#{id} and type=2
select l.*, nickname, image from tb_like l join tb_member m on(l.target_id = m.id) where user_id=#{id} and type=2
select count(*) from tb_like where user_id=#{id} and type=3

select l.*, r.content, fr.title_kor, di.change_name from tb_like l join tb_review r on(r.id = l.target_id) join (select f.id, title_kor from tb_film f join tb_review r on( r.film_id = f.id))fr on(fr.id = r.film_id) join (select d.film_id, i.change_name from tb_detail_film d join tb_film_image i on(d.id = i.dfilm_id))di on(di.film_id = r.film_id) where user_id=#{id} and type=3
